titles.title: A bill to repeal the section of the Middle Class Tax Relief and Job Creation Act of 2012 that requires the Federal Communications Commission to reallocate and auction the T-Band spectrum.
Don't Break Up the T-Band Act of 2018
Don’t Break Up the T-Band Act of 2018
Don't Break Up the T-Band Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Don't Break Up the T-Band Act of 2018
This bill repeals the provision of the Middle Class Tax Relief and Job Creation Act of 2012 that directs the Federal Communications Commission to reallocate and auction the 470-512 MHz band (referred to as the "T-Band spectrum").
